title: InvoKos
short_description: Invoicing solution designed to streamline billing and financial management with ease.
description: Custom invoice management system I developed for personal use, supporting dual languages (English and Croatian). Built with Angular, Node.js, and Firebase, it streamlines invoicing and offer management with features like creating, updating, and deleting invoices/offers, customer management, and generating branded PDFs using jsPDF. While the app can and will be improved, I'm proud that it successfully fulfills its intended purpose. It is responsive, secure, and customizable for business needs.

title: Constructor (Concept)
short_description: A concept for professional construction agency delivering precision and quality in every project.
description: The Constructor concept delivers a striking and confident online presence for a professional construction agency. Targeting homeowners, businesses, and developers, the site design ensures ease of navigation and focuses on building trust with potential clients through transparent communication and a commitment to quality craftsmanship.

title: Smile (Concept)
short_description: A concept for a modern dental care service delivering personalized and accessible care.
description: The Smile concept focuses on delivering a seamless online experience for a dental care brand. It targets individuals and families seeking trusted dental care, emphasizing accessibility and convenience. The design reflects the values of care, trust, and positivity, catering to users who value quality and personalized treatment.
